::Autofire::

"A promise of payment. Hmm.." Autofire says, deciding not to try and 
make Megatron understand the difference between opressing opposition 
and fighting it. Leaders never understood that anyways. "No, I want a 
garauntee of payment."

Autofire keeps his gun aimed at Megatron, thinking something 
over. "For now, I will work for you as long as you provide me with 
equipment and anything else I may need. However, with you alone, I 
doubt you can provide even that."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> He new Autofire would respond this way, as a Mercenary, he had 
worked for
> the Autobots, a move that outraged galvatron, but Galvatron did 
little to
> remedy this, but Megatron was desperate. "Even when I rule, there 
will
> always be someone who steps up with heroic nonsense, and the people 
who are
> ruled have to be kept under our heel. It would be more 
interesting". This
> robot was dangerous, Megatron noted, he would have to watch out for 
him. "I
> am here to rebuild what Galvatron destroyed, and as far as I know, 
I am the
> only Decepticon left. What do you want? Just a promise of payment 
for your
> services".
